summary: This is a mod created to replace the outdated Immersive Armors for NPCs by toolMJK. Requires Immersive Armors v6 to function!
descriptionHtml:
The original description for toolmjk\'s mod can be seen here: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21163

This is essentially identical to the original but made from scratch. However, I did not make duplicate armors (I don\\\'t know why he did). You can now enjoy Immersive Armors for NPCs once more!

[b]Requires Immersive Armors v6![/b]
[b][size=\"7\"]REQUIRES IMMERSIVE ARMORS V6![/size][/b]

To upgrade from the original mod:
1 Uninstall his mod
2 Open Skyrim, save in a cell with no altered NPCs (listed below)
3 Close Skyrim, install this mod!
3.5 Make sure this loads after Immersive Armors V6!
4 Play!

As you can see, I have duplicated his efforts tediously. [b]Please let me know of any bugs or issues![/b]

NPCs Altered

Whiterun
Amren, Sinmir, Hrongar, Eorlund Gray-Mane, Idolaf Battle-Born, Jon Battle-Born, Torvar, and Avulstein Grey-Mane

Dawnstar
Captain Wayfinder, Irlof, Alding, Gjuk, and Guthrum

Falkreath
Helvard, Valdr, and Thadgeir

Markarth
Vorstag, Ondolemar, Thongvor, Yngvar, Argis, Dryston, and Cosnach

Morthal
Gorm

Riften
Maul, Harrald, and Dirge

Solitude
Dorian, Safia, Bolgeir Bearclaw, Irnskar Ironhand, Legate Rikke, Ahtar, Tullius, and Jaree-Ra

Windhelm
Galmar Stone-Fist

Winterhold
Kai Wet-Pommel, and Golldir

Helgen
Hadvar, Ralof, Torolf, and Vilod

Misc
Erlendr

p.s. Why does the nexus dislike my apostrophes?
author: Gorbachev
